snippet: O. C. Brown of Memphis, the focal point of the Academy Award-winning documentary “Undefeated,” transferred to Austin Peay from Southern Mississippi
lead_paragraph: O. C. Brown of Memphis, the focal point of the Academy Award-winning documentary “Undefeated,” transferred to Austin Peay from Southern Mississippi
